DOC.brief_title: A Paroxetine- Placebo-Controlled Study 50 mg/Day 100 mg/Day EB-1010 Among Outpatients With Major Depressive Disorder Who Have Responded Inadequately Prior Selective Serotonin Reuptake Inhibitors ( SSRIs ) Serotonin Norepinephrine Reuptake Inhibitors ( SNRIs )
